consentModal.title: Cookie Settings
consentModal.description: This website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience, and analyze our traffic.

usage-explanation.title: How we use cookies
usage-explanation.description: With your consent, OOMOL may also use cookies and your IP address to collect individual statistics. OOMOL may use third-party services for this purpose. You can adjust or withdraw your consent at any time by visiting the Opt-Out.

necessary.title: Strictly necessary cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website and cannot be disabled.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.google-analytics: Used to distinguish unique users and track visitor behavior

more-info.title: More information
more-info.description: For any queries in relation to our policy on cookies and your choices, please contact us.
